task_requirements:
Implement P1-1 from specs/001-artk-core-v1/implementation-fixes.md:

**Add OIDC + TOTP Integration Test**
Location: core/typescript/tests/integration/oidc-totp-flow.test.ts (new file)

Test cases to implement:
1. should complete OIDC flow with TOTP MFA - Mock page and TOTP secret, configure provider with MFA, verify TOTP generated and submitted
2. should respect MFA timeout configuration (FR-010) - Verify custom timeout is applied
3. should handle TOTP entry failure gracefully - Test retry logic

Use vitest, mock Playwright Page, use otplib authenticator for TOTP generation.

Verification:
- npm run test -- tests/integration/oidc-totp-flow.test.ts (must pass)
- Test covers FR-009 (TOTP generation)
- Test covers FR-010 (timeout configuration)
